match.schema:
type: object
additionalProperties: false
properties:
  check_multioffer:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_people_delivery_batching:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  compare_sql_insert_values:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  use_builder_setcar_for_insert:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  save_setcar_xml_for_integrator:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_driver_status:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_driver_status_force_new:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_driver_chain:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_driver_chain_force_new:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_driver_reserve_order:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_driver_reserve_order_force_new:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  force_return_setcar:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  use_redis_as_data_source:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_courier_shift:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_courier_shift_force_new:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_driver_order_chain_begin:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  check_driver_order_chain_begin_force_new:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  use_raw_status:
    type: boolean
    default: false
  ignore_yandex_orders_in_reserve:
    type: boolean
    default: false
